entry.tran: 可自由参加的活动;众人同时争抢的情形
entry.def: A free-for-all is a situation in which several people or groups are trying to get something for themselves and there are no controls on how they do it.

entry.tran: 混战;群架;众人都参与的争吵
entry.def: A free-for-all is a disorganized fight or argument which lots of people join in.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
